text: Ipiaú is a city in Bahia, Brazil. == Location == The city is in the meeting point of the Contas River and the Água-Branca River (White-water River). Ipiaú is bordered by Ibirataia and Jequié to the north, Aiquara and Jitaúna to the west, Ibirataia and Barra do Rocha to the east and Itagibá to the south. == Economy == The city is an important producer and exporter of cacao in Brazil. == Important people == Ipiaú is the birthplace of many noted Brazilian writers and musicians such as Euclides Neto and Luiz Caldas. Category:Cities in Bahia Category:1913 establishments in Brazil
title: Ipiaú
